description: LISNR’s ultrasonic data-over-sound technology enables proximity verification & contactless transactions for merchants, financial service providers and mobility companies.
Little aggregates small operators and single vehicle owners on a technology platform to provide customers with a convenient, transparent, and quick service fulfillment.
Little Thinking Minds is a digital education company that aims to improve Arabic literacy for children through engaging and creative learning tools.
LivUp is a direct-to-consumer health food brand offering ready-to-heat meals and snacks delivered to customers’ doorsteps.

Location World is an IoT company that optimizes processes and resource allocation for the automotive, transportation, security, logistics and insurance industries through telematics, fleet management, and connected-car applications.
Lomar creates thobes, the robe-like traditional Arab men’s garments, with modern, fashion-forward touches.
Loog is a line of guitars designed to make it fun and easy to play music. They come with an app, flashcards and video lessons, to get kids playing songs on day one.

Lori’s tech-enabled platform optimizes logistics and drives down the cost of goods by connecting traders, manufacturers, warehouses, and clearing & forwarding agents who need to move freight, to available truck drivers across Kenya, Uganda, Rwanda and Nigeria.

Lucky has connected more than six million loyal customers with access to a growing range of easy-to-use credit products, discounts and cashback rewards that can be used in person and virtually with tens of thousands of local and global brands.
Luminus Education comprises several schools, colleges and institutes, offering fully accredited post-secondary vocational and technical training for youth aged 16 and above.
Lummo is a digital bookkeeping app for SMEs in Indonesia, enabling them to record their sales, expenses and cash transactions using their smartphones.
A venture capital fund that invests directly in human capital, Lumni finances education for students in exchange for a small fixed percentage of their future income over a pre-set time period.
Luna PAC offers customers high-quality personal care and makeup products that are sourced from premium European raw materials and fully manufactured in Egypt.

MadfooatCom is an online, real-time bill presentment and payment service (EBPPS) that enables the billers’ clients to inquire about and pay their bills via convenient and secure electronic channels 24/7.
Magnamed supports patients with respiratory problems using mechanical ventilation equipment.
MaqTec engineers, manufactures and sells innovative agriculture machinery in niche markets.
Maria Almenara is the leading artisanal bakery in Peru, offering fresh, homemade products at large scale.

Marti is a Turkish micromobilty company that offers free-floating, locally-manufactured, electric mobility across the country and provides locals with easily accessible, on demand, and affordable transportation options.
Masana provides a highly specialized range of cleaning solutions, including contract cleaning, carpet deep cleaning, high rise window cleaning, sanitation and hygiene for pest control services.
Maskota is a one-stop shop for pets as well as pet food, accessories and services in Mexico.
